CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleTriggerEnterEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code:
-- Parameters local TriggerBodyEntity = event.TriggerBodyEntity -------------------------------------------------------- local stat = self.Entity.PlayerStat
if TriggerBodyEntity.Name == "ExpItem" then stat:UpExp() TriggerBodyEntity:Destroy() end
if TriggerBodyEntity.Name == "Item" then stat:UpExp() TriggerBodyEntity:Destroy() end
